title: YouTube video translation is getting an AI-powered dubbing tool upgrade
description: YouTube will incorporate Google's Aloud tech to create a tool that can generate create multi-lingual video dubs

title: Apple wants the Vision Pro to be the world’s most expensive in-flight accessory
description: Apple has created a dedicated Travel Mode for using the Vision Pro on a plane.

title: Privately, Sony boss Jim Ryan doesn't seem too worried about Call of Duty in the Microsoft acquisition
description: A once-private email has revealed that PlayStation Boss Jim Ryan was less concerned about Call of Duty than was public.

title: Your USB drive could be hiding some awful new malware
description: New malware variant from a well known Chinese state-sponsored hacking group is running rampant via USB drive.

title: Starfield's development was streamlined thanks to ignoring PS5
description: Bethesda VP Pete Hines explains how the team have slowly warmed to Xbox exclusivity and how developing for PS5 would have made the process much harder.

title: Apple might have already ruined the Vision Pro for VR gaming
description: A restrictive ‘boundary system’ could unfortunately make the Apple Vision Pro sub-optimal for gaming.

title: Starfield may have no space fishing but it has great biome options
description: Todd Howard explains the pros and cons of Starfield's map and its little quests.

title: Google powers up PDF tools in Chrome browser - but there’s a catch
description: Google is set to bring OCR tools to Chrome's PDF reader after stating over 360 billion PDFs are inaccessible - but users will need a Chromebook to use it.

title: Konami website hints at Metal Gear Solid 4 releasing on other platforms
description: Metal Gear Solid 4 could be released on more platforms in the future according to a hint on the Konami website.

title: Players will only be able to romance a total of four characters in Starfield
description: Todd Howard reveals the romanceable options in Starfield and how companions work.

title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Max, Prime Video and more this weekend (June 23)
description: From long-awaited Marvel thrillers to returning kitchen dramas, there’s plenty to watch this weekend.

title: Microsoft uncovers savage new cyberattacks hitting Linux and IoT devices
description: Hackers are brute forcing their way into Linux and IoT devices to deploy cryptomining malware, Microsoft finds.

title: Windows 11 change proves so unpopular that Microsoft reverses course
description: Credit to Microsoft that it’s listening, although the irate feedback on this tweak was hard to miss.

title: Nvidia confirms when the RTX 4060 will go on sale and its sooner than you think
description: Nvidia confirms when the RTX 4060 will go on sale, gives us a price, and promises faster performance than the RTX 3060.

title: Gmail is making a small change that could have serious consequences
description: Make sure you don't miss that vital email as Gmail changes its notifications on Android.

title: Pixel vs iPhone: Google mocks Apple’s lack of innovation in new YouTube shorts
description: Google's new series of YouTube shorts say iPhones are past their prime, but the sales figures say otherwise.

title: OpenAI says it's your fault your ChatGPT account got breached
description: OpenAI statement states sales of stolen ChatGPT credentials on the dark web are the result of malware on users' devices.

title: Netflix’s cancelation spree is happening so fast it’s even news to some show creators
description: Doctor Who actor calls Netflix "rude" for not telling her it had axed the comedian's streaming show.

title: Google streamlines Adobe Express access on student Chromebooks
description: Google announces deeper integration with Adobe Express for schools - making it easier for students and teachers to access content creation platform.

title: Arnie's Netflix TV show was bigger than Succession and Ted Lasso
description: Fubar, the first-ever TV series starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, was the most-watched TV show in late May.

title: Amazon is putting up $100m to battle Microsoft and Google for the next generation of AI
description: AWS is offering workshops, engagements, and training to get you familiar with AI development and deployment.

title: Waiting for a new iPhone mini? The leaked Asus Zenfone 10 could be a good alternative
description: The upcoming Asus Zenfone 10 appears to look a lot like the Zenfone 9, but with some major spec upgrades.

title: The PS6 and Xbox Series X successor will launch in 2028 according to Microsoft
description: A Microsoft court document has confirmed that the next generation of console hardware isn't coming until 2028.

title: Xbox Cloud Gaming more popular on console than mobile, Microsoft admits
description: Some surprising information on Xbox Cloud Gaming was revealed during the Microsoft / FTC court hearing.

title: Windows 11 Moment 3 is coming to all PCs next month, whether you like it or not
description: Wondering where your Moment 3 update is for Windows 11? It’s coming to everyone in July, ready or not…

title: DuckDuckGo is bringing its browser to Windows
description: DuckDuckGo Windows browser is now available in beta for all users, making the switch to a privacy-first tool even easier - here's all you need to know.

title: Intel just axed its own flagship Arc GPU, but there’s no need to worry
description: Don’t panic: the graphics card hasn’t been canceled entirely, and a new generation is still on the way.

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Friday, June 23 (game #515)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: Don't worry, WhatsApp isn't actually using your phone's microphone to listen in
description: After two months of waiting, Google finally rolled out a fix to stop WhatsApp from triggering the Android Privacy Dashboard.
